name: Mingxin Sword Sect
desc: The number one sect in the east of the Tongxuan Realm, ruling the world with supreme sword path. The Cloud Pattern Array is their secret manual. [Sword Path Specialization] As a sword cultivator, your combat power is amazing when using sword-type weapons, and your comprehension speed in the sword path far exceeds ordinary people.
alignment: consistent in action. Both heavy sword and heart method are prioritized
weight: focusing on illuminating the heart and seeing the nature.

name: Baishou Sect
desc: Famous for taming spiritual beasts, keeping various demonic beasts and monsters as combat power. [Beast Taming Master] You have a unique beast taming talent; capturing demonic beasts is easy for you, and you are good at driving beast groups to fight for you.

name: Shuijing Sect
desc: One of the ten righteous sects, but actually strictly neutral. Possesses the immortal realm treasure "Heaven-Piercing Water Mirror" to predict the future. [Seeking Luck and Avoiding Evil] You have extraordinary intuition, a broad vision, and are extremely likely to find encounters during exploration.
member_act_style: Calm and smooth in handling affairs
alignment: likes to overcome hardness with softness
weight: good at borrowing power and counter-control.

name: Mingwang Sect
desc: Walking the path of the underworld, with cold and fierce techniques. [Netherworld Access] You practice underworld laws with a firm mind, and when breaking through bottlenecks, you have no distractions, leading to a higher success rate.
alignment: awe of karma but unafraid of killing

name: Zhugou Sect
desc: A major evil sect. Famous for artifact refining, mechanisms, and assassination, traditionally sinister and aloof. [Assassination Expert] You are proficient in stealth and assassination; for strong enemies, avoiding direct confrontation and seeking assassination is often your best winning strategy.

name: Hehuan Sect
desc: Entering the Dao through emotion, increasing cultivation through dual cultivation, good at manipulating people's hearts and long in power changes. [Dual Cultivation Secret Technique] Your constitution is special; through dual cultivation, you can gain cultivation improvements far exceeding ordinary people, which is your best shortcut to raising your realm.
alignment: good at grasping human desires and situations

name: Zhenhun Sect
desc: Iron-blooded style, good at calming souls, sealing evil, and delivering from distress, with fierce suppressing techniques. [Indestructible Vajra] You practice body protection divine skills, possessing extremely strong physical defense and damage reduction abilities, as immovable as a mountain.
alignment: values soul calming and evil suppression

name: Ghost Soul Shadow Devouring Sect
desc: The sect's core manual is the "Underworld Record". Underworld qi is the foundation. [Always Following as a Shadow] You are extremely good at movement and escape techniques, always able to retreat safely from danger, and can also seek opportunities to assassinate isolated enemies.
weight: good at stealth and unexpected attacks.

name: Thousand Sails City
desc: A major artifact refining sect, where skilled craftsmen gather. Famous artifacts include Soul-Extinguishing Silk and Soul-Fixing Blue Star. Merchants gather and it's self-sufficient. [Divine Craftsmanship] You are well-versed in artifact refining and business; nurturing weapons often transforms them, and you always profit in trades.

name: Miaohua Sect
desc: Specializes in musical killing and mental control, with treacherous and feminine techniques, using invisible zither sounds to disturb people's minds and kill invisibly. [Demonic Sound in Ears] You are good at disturbing people's minds with music, with deep and long-lasting spiritual power; although not good at physical combat, your methods are treacherous.
member_act_style: Deception hidden deep within elegant and ethereal appearance
alignment: likes to control situations with words and music
weight: killing without a trace of smoke.

name: Huixuan Sect
desc: The world's number one array sect, unique with arrays and array formulas, focusing on array deduction and clever use. [Array Qi Gathering] You are good at using arrays to assist cultivation, able to gather heaven and earth spiritual qi, with cultivation speed faster than ordinary people and frequent unexpected gains.
weight: good at counter-controlling enemies with back-hand arrays in battle

name: Sleepless City
desc: Practicing Aurora Mystic Truth Law, famous for the absolute defense of the Ten-Thousand-Mile Aurora Wall. [Never Ending Life] Your vitality is extremely tenacious, with doubled healing effects and lifespan far exceeding cultivators of the same rank.
weight: acting openly but also with deep foresight

name: Tianxingjian Sect
desc: Specializes in Haoran Qi, acting openly and righteously, firm and decisive, with strong restraint against evil and unorthodox ways. [Haoran Righteous Qi] You nurture Haoran Qi, with long qi pulses; when facing enemies of lower realm, you can exert extremely strong suppression.
weight: taking the lead in eliminating demons and defending the Dao

name: Shimo Sect
desc: The number one demonic sect in the Tongxuan Realm, acting overbearingly and cruelly, good at searching for essence and devouring blood and physical demonic skills. [Habitual Plunder] You admire strength and plundering; although plundering mortals harms heaven and harmony, it brings you amazing wealth and resources.
preferred_weapon: viewing all living beings as blood food.
